full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 743 Filed 08/10/22 Page 53 of 247 181 LBUVMAX2 Visoski - direct 1 A. Had to have been mid to late '90s. 2 Q. Do you remember the exact year? 3 A. I do not. 4 Q. What did Virginia look like? 5 A. A shorter woman with dirty blond hair. 6 Q. Did anyone ever tell you how old Virginia was when you met her? 7 A. No. 8 Q. Do you know how old she was when you met her? 9 A. No, I did not. 10 Q. About how many times do you remember seeing Virginia Roberts as a passenger on Mr. Epstein's private planes? 11 A. She was on the airplane a couple times. I couldn't guess 12 the quantity, but definitely more than once. 13 MS. COMEY: May I have a moment, your Honor? 14 THE COURT: You may. 15 (Counsel conferred) 16 MS. COMEY: Nothing further, your Honor. 17 THE COURT: Okay. Mr. Everdell, you may proceed with 18 the cross-examination. 19 MR. EVERDELL: Thank you, your Honor. 20 At this point, with the Court's permission, I would 21 put a binder up in the witness box. 22 THE COURT: Okay. 23 MS. COMEY: Your Honor, to be clear, I have not seen 24 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00017415
